title: Have you used Linotype Vialog or Aptifer on any projects?
content: I am collecting examples of Linotype’s Vialog and Aptifer typefaces in use. Has anybody out there used these in materials that are easy to get a high-quality copy of—PDF or hardcopy?
author: Dunwich Type

comments.content: The city of Munich's transportation system (subway, commuter rail, steetcar, bus, etc) uses Vialog. If you poke around their website, you might be able to find downloadable time tables and maps - [www.mvg-mobil.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111219103209/http:/www.mvg-mobil.de/ "www.mvg-mobil.de/")
